role_definition: Track/log the allocation and remittance of rewards points. The service domain acts as a transaction log similar where the instrument is not subject to interest considerations (as with cash) but may have a finite life-time with expiry dates on reward points
example_of_use: A customer transaction that generates reward points is captured on the log, resulting in an increase in their available point balance
executive_summary: Administer the booking and remittance of rewards points
key_features: Capture reward points awards and remittance transactions
Process reward point expiry terms for limited life reward points
triggered_by: Customer transactions that generate reward points
